invite.description: By adding a member to this group, they can see all its content and create new

submit.error: An error occurred when inviting the user
submit.success: The user was successfully added to the group

remove.description: This will remove the member from this group

remove.success: The member has been removed from this group

role.success: The member's role was successfully updated

update.text: Here you can edit this member

delete.description: This action will permanently delete this group and all the data it contains.
delete.confirmDescription: Deleting this group will remove all its data and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
delete.error: An error occurred when deleting the group

settings.description: Here you can change settings of your group.
settings.name: Name

save.error: An error occurred when updating the group
